column1: '''A Meeting in the Hyades''' is the title of a fanfiction story by [[Marion Zimmer Bradley]]. It was first published as a separate work ([[wikipedia:Chapbook|chapbook]]) in 1961
column2: and then again in [[Anduril (USA)|''Anduril'']] and ''Astra's Tower Special Leaflet'' (pp.14-29<ref>[http://marionzimmerbradley.wordpress.com/primary-works-by-format/ Marion Zimmer Bradley: A Bibliography]

column1: A Meeting in the Hyades is a [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]/[[Wikipedia:Darkover|Darkover]] crossover (a fanfiction story in which two or more fandoms are combined in some way). It is a story where Regis Hastur
column2: or a character that later developed into Regis
column3: meets a character from ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' somewhere in the Darkovan mountains.<ref>[http://fanlore.org/wiki/A_Meeting_in_Hyades Fanlore.org]
